script.text: 对话一：小黑告白王崩 (Xiao Hei Confesses to Wang Beng)
script.en: Dialogue 1: 小黑 confesses to 王崩.

script.text: 下课以后。小黑跟自己说了一周了：如果他说"哦谢谢"，那就说"哦谢谢"吧。她活得过来的。absent的爸爸她活下来了。对自己皮肤的不满她活下来了。这只是one more thing。
script.en: After class. 小黑 has been telling herself all week: if he says "oh thanks," then he says "oh thanks." She'll survive. She survived an absent father. She survived hating her own skin. This is just one more thing.
王崩.
Hm?

script.zh: 我喜欢你。从第一天就喜欢了。
script.en: I like you. Since day one.
王崩 stops.

script.zh: 所有人都知道。女生知道。矮中知道。就你一个人不知道。或者你知道但是你不在乎。
script.en: Everyone knows. The girls know. 矮中 knows. You're the only one who doesn't. Or you know and you just don't care.

script.zh: 你不用说什么。但我必须告诉你。因为这件事一直在杀我。每次我跟你吵台湾的事，不是因为我在乎台湾。我是说——我确实在乎，中国的发展是very impressive的，CCP让几亿人脱贫了——但那不是我吵的原因。
script.en: You don't have to say anything. But I have to tell you. Because this has been killing me. Every time I argue with you about Taiwan, it's not because I care about Taiwan. I mean-- I do care, China's development is very impressive, the CCP lifted hundreds of millions out of poverty-- but that's not why I argue.
Then why do you argue?

script.zh: 因为这是唯一能让你看我的方式。
script.en: Because it's the only way to make you look at me.

script.zh: 你如果说"谢谢"我会尖叫。
script.en: If you say "thanks" I will scream.
...I wasn't going to say thanks.
Then what?

script.zh: 我要说的是……我最近在想。从club那晚以后。你坐在路边，我把外套给你了。我不做那种事的。我不给别人东西。我不坐路边。我不关心人有没有事。但是那天我做了。为了你。
script.en: What I'm trying to say is... I've been thinking. Since that night at the club. You were sitting on the curb, and I gave you my jacket. I don't do that. I don't give people things. I don't sit on curbs. I don't care if someone's okay. But that night I did. For you.

script.zh: 所以我不知道。我不擅长这个。我擅长经济、繁体字、台湾。我不擅长……这个。
script.en: So I don't know. I'm not good at this. I'm good at economics, traditional characters, Taiwan. I'm not good at... this.
...do you wanna try?
Try what?

script.zh: 喝奶茶。就我们两个。不提台湾。不说政治。就是两个人喝奶茶。
script.en: Boba. Just the two of us. No Taiwan. No politics. Just two people drinking boba.
Can I mention Taiwan once?
Once.
...okay. Let's go.

script.text: 他们走了。很近但没碰到。小黑的心跳快到她能听到。王崩一直看前面，因为他如果看她会失去composure，而王崩从来不失去composure。
script.en: They walk. Close but not touching. 小黑's heartbeat is so loud she can hear it. 王崩 keeps looking straight ahead, because if he looks at her he'll lose his composure, and 王崩 never loses his composure.

script.text: 对话二：图书馆——矮中和清清 (Library — Ai Zhong and Qingqing)
script.en: Dialogue 2: Library -- 矮中 and 清清.

script.text: 矮中拿着中文作业来找清清。他自己做的——字歪歪扭扭的，一半是错的，但他做了。
script.en: 矮中 brings his Chinese homework to 清清. He did it himself -- characters crooked, half of them wrong, but he did it.
清清, can you check my homework?
...you did this yourself?
Yeah. I know the writing's terrible.

script.zh: 不烂。这个字写错了——那是大，不是太，差一个点。这个写反了。但是……你确实在认真做。
script.en: It's not terrible. This character is wrong-- that's 大, not 太, you're missing a dot. This one's backwards. But... you're clearly putting in the effort.

script.zh: club那晚以后我一直在努力。
script.en: I've been trying hard since that night at the club.
What changed?

script.zh: 我看到怪老师，意识到……我不想做那种在中国十五年了还写不好字的人。我想真的学。不只是酒吧中文。真正的中文。
script.en: I saw 怪老师 and realized... I don't wanna be the kind of person who's been in China fifteen years and still can't write properly. I wanna actually learn. Not just bar Chinese. Real Chinese.
...that's the most mature thing you've ever said.
Don't tell anyone. I have a reputation.
Your secret's safe with me.

script.zh: 清清……你为什么帮我？我不聪明。不organized。我把"矮"纹在了胳膊上。为什么你一直帮我？
script.en: 清清... why do you help me? I'm not smart. Not organized. I got "short" tattooed on my arm. Why do you keep helping me?
Is it because you feel sorry for me?
No.
Then why?

script.zh: 因为你问了。没有别人问我帮忙。他们看我就是……聪明的那个。冷的那个。什么都figured out的那个。你是唯一一个把我当普通人的人。
script.en: Because you asked. Nobody else asks me for help. They look at me and see... the smart one. The cold one. The one who has it all figured out. You're the only one who treats me like a normal person.
...you are a normal person.
Not to most people.

script.zh: 那大部分人是笨蛋。……包括我。
script.en: Then most people are idiots. ...including me.

script.text: 她笑了。真的笑了。清清不笑。清清的表情是tight smile加"嗯"。但现在，在图书馆里，她笑了。
script.en: She laughs. Actually laughs. 清清 doesn't laugh. 清清's expression is a tight smile plus "mm." But now, in the library, she laughs.

script.zh: 你笑了！这是我第一次听到你笑！
script.en: You laughed! That's the first time I've heard you laugh!
Stop.

script.zh: 你的笑声很好听！应该多笑！
script.en: Your laugh sounds great! You should laugh more!
Look at the homework.
Okay okay okay. Homework.

grammarNotes.title: 比 (comparison)
grammarNotes.body:
中国的发展比其他国家impressive。
他穿得比我好看。

grammarNotes.title: 从...就 (since...already)
grammarNotes.body:
从第一天就喜欢了。= Since the first day I've liked you.
从小就出差。= Since childhood, always on business trips.

grammarNotes.title: 不比 — not more than
grammarNotes.body:
我不比你高。= I'm not taller than you.
Note: A 不比 B + adj doesn't mean 'less than' — it means 'not MORE than' (could be equal or less). Subtle difference from 没有: 我没有你高 = I'm not as tall as you.
